description: This Java source file defines the class 'MockMeteringCluster', which is a mock implementation for a meter reading cluster used in testing or simulation scenarios. It provides methods to set and get watt readings, as well as to manipulate attributes related to power measurement.

classes.name: MockMeteringCluster
classes.description: A mock class representing a metering cluster with methods to simulate power demand readings and report attribute data.

methods.name: setMultiplier
methods.description: Sets the multiplier attribute used in calculations.

methods.name: setDivisor
methods.description: Sets the divisor attribute used in calculations.

methods.name: setWatts
methods.description: Sets the wattage and reports the value.

methods.name: getMyBytes
methods.description: Converts a 24-bit integer value into a 3-byte array.

methods.name: getAttributeData
methods.description: Generates byte data for a provided attribute info, representing the attribute's current value.
